items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Y2K vibes
items.body: Adorable. Normally I wear a Medium but I got the Large just to be safe, and it fits great. Not thin or cheap looking at all, feels like it was quality made. Read more
items.author: Brianna Bannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Edgy, and Super Cute!
items.body: I absolutely love this cardigan! The fuzzy trim gives it such a fun, edgy lookâ€”perfect for anyone who likes mixing a little goth or punk style with cozy comfort. The material is soft and warm, and it feels really nice against the skin without being itchy. The fit is flattering and true to size, and I love the deep V-neck styleâ€”it looks great layered over a tank top or even a simple dress. The fuzzy details on the sleeves and neckline really make it stand out and give it that trendy, statement vibe. Iâ€™ve gotten so many compliments wearing this! Itâ€™s perfect for fall or winter and looks great with jeans, boots, or even a mini skirt for a night out. If you love cute and unique sweaters, this one is definitely worth it! ðŸ–¤âœ¨ Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but size up
items.body: Cute but size up. I had to return because it was too short Read more
items.author: Coco

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Feels like plastic and itâ€™s not woven correctly
items.body: Feels cheap and constructed of plastic yarn. Could be such a cute Y2K style but the execution between material, weave and fit as if itâ€™s a cheap impersonation of a temu product. Read more
items.author: Aimee R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO CUTE!
items.body: I didnâ€™t know what to expect with this top but as soon as I opened up the packaging I was so impressed! The material is pretty good quality. Itâ€™s not too thick but also not too thin. Itâ€™s not itchy at all & looks so flattering on! I think itâ€™ll be great for the fall & winter season so Iâ€™m looking forward to wearing it out! Read more
items.author: Greta Li

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
